item.hostilenetworks.fab_directive.desc: Stores selections from a Loot Fabricator
item.hostilenetworks.fab_directive.desc2: Right-Click to copy, Shift-Right-Click to apply
hostilenetworks.gui.learner_empty.3: when placed in the Deep Learner.
hostilenetworks.gui.learner_empty.5: In order to train the model
hostilenetworks.gui.learner_empty.6: you must deliver the killing blow.
hostilenetworks.gui.name: Name
hostilenetworks.gui.upgrade_disabled: Models cannot be upgraded via kills.

System energy levels critical
hostilenetworks.fail.model: Please insert a Data Model to begin the simulation
hostilenetworks.fail.faulty: Insufficient data in model. Please insert a basic model or better

hostilenetworks.fail.redstone:

hostilenetworks.msg.multiple_models: Multiple models (%s and %s) matched the target entity. This is a modpack configuration issue.
hostilenetworks.msg.no_model: No known models exist for this specimen.
hostilenetworks.trivia.glow_squid:
Deep in the ocean they stow.
Blessed by a luminescent glow.
Dare you take it as your own?
hostilenetworks.trivia.sheep:
Masters of color, and all things warm.
Usually held back, unless blessed by _jeb.
hostilenetworks.trivia.iron_golem:
The mind of a pumpkin,
piloting a metal frame.
Defends the village,
but not quite tame.
hostilenetworks.trivia.squid:
Found in water, aimlessly so.
Drifts around without a goal.
Some wish they would just go.
hostilenetworks.trivia.mooshroom:
Is it a cow or a fungus?
Not scary, unless you think
about The Last of Us.
hostilenetworks.trivia.chicken:
"Quack."
No, that's not right, try again.
"Cluck."
There we go.
hostilenetworks.trivia.cow:
Provides milk while alive.
Provides meat while dead.
The duality of cows.
hostilenetworks.trivia.rabbit:
The rabbit hops and hops and hops.
He does this even through the night.
Never fights, unless his type is Ninety-Nine.
hostilenetworks.trivia.polar_bear:
A Bear from the Pole,
quite strange indeed.
He is a sight to behold,
yet he cannot read.
hostilenetworks.trivia.bat:
A well known fact is that
some bats are vampiric.
Unfortunately, it's up to you to find out which.
Try not to die.
hostilenetworks.trivia.hoglin:
A Hog of incredible size.
Lives in Hell, and can be zombified.
hostilenetworks.trivia.snow_golem:
The mind of a pumpkin, yet again.
He probably couldn't count to ten.
hostilenetworks.trivia.pig:
The pig is an interesting case.
Worse than a cow for drops,
and worse than a horse for riding.
Maybe the killing is kindness...
hostilenetworks.trivia.breeze:
An airy relative of the Blaze,
Breezes can only be found
within the confines of a Trial Chamber.
hostilenetworks.trivia.blaze:
Bring buckets and watch in despair
as it evaporates, and everything is
on fire. You are on fire.
hostilenetworks.trivia.creeper:
An inverse architect by trade.
Generally misunderstood.
hostilenetworks.trivia.drowned:
An undead man who has
defied death again.
Somehow he learned to use a Trident.
hostilenetworks.trivia.ender_dragon:
Lord of The End, yet keeps no hoard.
Destroy the crystals, break the cycle.
hostilenetworks.trivia.enderman:
Friendly unless provoked.
Fooled by pumpkins.
Teleports short distances.
hostilenetworks.trivia.ghast:
If you hear something that sounds
like a crying llama, you're probably
hearing a ghast.
hostilenetworks.trivia.skeleton:
A formidable archer, but may be
running some sort of cheat engine.
A shield would be useful.
hostilenetworks.trivia.slime:
"A Slime Haiku"
The bounce
bounce his bounce
squish
hostilenetworks.trivia.spider:
Nocturnal douchebags.
Drops strands of string for some reason.
hostilenetworks.trivia.witch:
Affinity with potions and concoctions.
Maybe you should develop an antidote.
hostilenetworks.trivia.wither_skeleton:
A charred skeleton.
Its bow did not survive the process.
Hunted for their skulls.
hostilenetworks.trivia.wither:
Do not approach this enemy, run!
Too bad it isn't weak to the sun.
hostilenetworks.trivia.zombie:
They moan in the moonlight.
Does not understand the need
for personal space.
hostilenetworks.trivia.guardian:
Some sort of mutated pufferfish.
Beware the beam attack!
hostilenetworks.trivia.evoker:
A powerful spellcaster.
Knows the secrets of undeath.
hostilenetworks.trivia.elder_guardian:
The largest of the ocean
creatures, it lives in great
underwater monuments.
hostilenetworks.trivia.magma_cube:
What happens if we give lava life?
This, this is what happens.
That's why we don't do that.
hostilenetworks.trivia.phantom:
Annoying little beasts who
insist you go to sleep.
The Insomnia Police.
hostilenetworks.trivia.shulker:
A reinforced, teleporting cannon.
Makes a nice chest when slain.
hostilenetworks.trivia.vindicator:
An axe-wielding maniac.
Probably advisable to keep a
safe distance.
hostilenetworks.trivia.warden:
The slumbering lord of
an Ancient City.
He cannot see,
but he does not need to.
hostilenetworks.trivia.zombified_piglin:
A poor nether-dweller turned
into a zombie.
Has a lot of gold, though.
hostilenetworks.trivia.ars_wilden:
Protectors of The Wilds.
Their form depends on their home.
Oh, and one of them can summon wolves.
hostilenetworks.trivia.mimic:
A chest with a hunger.
One you wish to plunder.
Be careful,
lest you be torn asunder.
hostilenetworks.trivia.piglich:
He resides in The Other.
His health bar makes weak men shudder.
Pray he doesn't utter the words:
"Your Mother."
hostilenetworks.trivia.raven:
An ebony bird, full of lore.
Quoth the Raven "Nevermore."
hostilenetworks.trivia.alpha_yeti:
Leader of the Yeti Tribe.
The cave is his design.
I wonder if he'd take a bribe,
to let you skip the fight.
hostilenetworks.trivia.carminite_golem:
A golem without a pumpkin
is like a castle without a king.
This one is fueled by dark magic.
It's quite a scary thing.
hostilenetworks.trivia.death_tome:
All of those enchanted books
that you discarded?
This is what happens to them.
It's your fault, really.
hostilenetworks.trivia.deer:
They gaze with judgement.
I'm not sure what you did,
but clearly they're annoyed.
hostilenetworks.trivia.fire_beetle:
Why does the fire beetle
get its own data model?
It drops the same things
as a creeper...
hostilenetworks.trivia.twilight_giant:
Sky-dwellers.
They reflect our universe,
four times larger.
Perhaps you could ask for a pickaxe.
hostilenetworks.trivia.twilight_goblin:
Small folk, adorned with
the metal of knights.
How they got it
is beyond my knowledge.
hostilenetworks.trivia.helmet_crab:
When you leave helmets
lying around on beaches,
this is what happens.
You get crabs.
hostilenetworks.trivia.hydra:
Each head slain causes
two to rise.
If only you had a weapon
of a larger size...
hostilenetworks.trivia.kobold:
"You no take candle!"
is the only phrase I've
heard a kobold say.
He doesn't even have one!
hostilenetworks.trivia.lich:
A death-defying wizard.
His protective shield is weak
to magical damage.
Panics once it breaks.
hostilenetworks.trivia.minotaur:
Half man, Half cow.
Far less imposing than a centaur.
Moooves incredibly fast.
hostilenetworks.trivia.naga:
This deadly serpent lives
in his own courtyard.
He will demolish his home
to end your life.
hostilenetworks.trivia.redcap:
Simple goblin miners.
They just don't want to share.
The Twilight isn't that deep,
to be fair.
hostilenetworks.trivia.skeleton_druid:
Apparently some skeletons
figured out that golden hoes
can channel nature magic.
I'm disappointed that they did it first.
hostilenetworks.trivia.snow_queen:
Atop a frozen castle
is a frozen queen.
She wishes never to be seen.
hostilenetworks.trivia.twilight_ice:
The Snow Queen went through
a great deal of effort to
bring ice to life.
The failed experiments still wander around.
hostilenetworks.trivia.towerwood_borer:
What happens when you cross
termintes with carminite?
You get these little bastards.
They can eat towerwood!
hostilenetworks.trivia.ur_ghast:
Quite possibly the largest
specimen I have ever seen.
Could you hope to slay it?
hostilenetworks.trivia.winter_wolf:
Pack hunters who thrive
in the snow.
Surprisingly, they have the same fur
as a Yeti.
hostilenetworks.trivia.twilight_wraith:
The specter of a long-dead king.
Seeks to prevent you from taking
his things.
hostilenetworks.trivia.yeti:
A lame, normal Yeti.
Wishes he was cool, like
the Alpha Yeti.
hostilenetworks.trivia.basalz:
The much bulkier cousin
of our flammable friend.
Bestowed with earthen strength.
hostilenetworks.trivia.blitz:
A wind elemental
by another name.
Fortunately, they lack control
of thunder.
hostilenetworks.trivia.blizz:
Take a Blaze
and remove the heat.
The resulting husk is
the icy Blizz.
